row.process:
:SET &runid# = SYS_ACT_RESTART_ME_NR() :PRINT " Delete of the client &CLIENT#"
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" cd &PATH_UTILITY# set rc=0
echo ************************************* echo Exécution de la copy client : echo ucybdbcc -V -LE -B -E -S&CLIENT# echo ************************************* echo. ucybdbcc -V -LE -B -E -S&CLIENT# set rc=%errorlevel%
@set retcode=%rc% @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode
:CASE "UNIX" cd &PATH_UTILITY#
echo "*************************************" echo "Exécution de la copy client :" echo "./ucybdbcc -V -LE -B -E -S&CLIENT#" echo "*************************************" echo "" ./ucybdbcc -V -LE -B -E -S&CLIENT# rc=$? exit $rc :OTHER
:ENDSWITCH

row.pre_process:
:PUT_ATT LOGIN = &LOGIN# !:INC JOBI.CLIENT_WITHOUT_AUDIT, NOFOUND=IGNORE :INC JOBI.UNIX_SHELL, NOFOUND=IGNORE !:INC JOBI.ALIAS, NOFOUND=IGNORE !
:PRINT "" :PRINT " Delete of client &CLIENT#" :IF &CLIENT# = &$CLIENT# : PRINT "ERREUR - You are connected on the client to delete" : STOP MSG, 50, "ERREUR - You are connected on the client to delete" :ENDIF
